parameters: Welcome, child of man, you seem to be in good spirits.

Hehehe, it's fine if you don't understand now. You all will
surely overcome it eventually...

More importantly... I've opened a gacha shop here. Would you
like to give it a spin?
What?! A gacha shop, what's that?!

Well... I can spin the gacha at the guild, so I don't really
need to do it here, I guess.

Hehehe... I'm troubled if you think my gacha is the same as
those other ones.
Why, my gacha has a double chance rate!!
The gacha is free!? That's insane!!!
Come on, let's spin the gacha!

Such generosity is like a god! I'll stick with you from now
on!!

You can now spin the gacha for free with a doubled chance
rate!
Welcome, child of man. Would you like to spin the gacha?
You might gain some wonderful companions!
How did the results turn out? Please try again.

It's a shame you lost... Unfortunately, we cannot offer a
refund.
Goddess Stone 85% SR Weapon 12% SSR Weapon 3%

Here you can exchange the Goddess Stones and items you've
obtained from the gacha.
